name: Specter of Spectrum
description:
Inspired by the 80s arcade machines that were designed to kill you fast and eat up your quarters. In this case it's a bullet hell.

This game will be getting free updates in the future.

Controls WASDMovementHold ShiftSlow DownHold Left ClickMain ShotRight ClickSub Shot (Uses 200 MP)QOpen/Close MapEscPause
